description.value:
You add two of the following powers to your spellbook.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.fRAZnxckH5pSEW1e]{Charm of the Defender}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.ghNfy7D5z13aSLpA]{Lightning Bolt}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.Og4ZNFhnudr2lJ0Q]{Phantom Foes}
